price: Nasi tulidhani kuwa watu na majini hawamzulii uwongo Mwenyezi Mungu.
arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلۡإِنسُ وَٱلۡجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا
footnotes: Na hakika sisi tulikuwa tunadhani kuwa haiwi binaadamu au jini kumzulia Mwenyezi Mungu jambo ambalo si laiki naye kusifika nalo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-annā ẓanannā an lan taqūla al-insu wal-jinu ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban
